head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths NORDEN, MARGARET L.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths NORDEN, MARGARET L.

block.p: NORDEN-Margaret L. On October 18, 2000 at age 98. Beloved wife of the late Eric W. Norden, loving mother of Peter & Ruth, cherished grandmother of Linda and Will and the late Debbie, great-grandmother of Luke and Alec. Services Friday, 11:30AM at ''The Riverside'', 76 St. and Amsterdam Ave. Contributions may be made to Congregation Habonim, 44 West 66th Street, New York City 10023.
